rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramp integration and tactile floor guidance for local building norms.

Open-plan kitchen and living area that adheres to minimalist design principles, with a central island counter, open shelving, and ample natural light. Vastu guidelines ensure the entrance faces the east or north for positive energy flow.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars, non-slip flooring, and proper ventilation, placed in a corner that respects privacy as per local norms.

openings.description: Large opening to ensure easy movement between spaces and maintain open layout.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living area, designed for maximum natural light and ventilation while following Vastu principles for east/west exposure.
